about_the_game:
The sequel to “UKNON Jones & Guynelk – Awesome!”

After Jones' friends are rescued, he discovers that his grandfather has mysteriously disappeared. He was searching for a mythical treasure called the “Crystal Cereals”. Jones, Guynelk, Elsa LOVELUST and the princess Sapphire decide to go in search of the Crystal Cereal to find Jones' grandfather.

Main features:

-Explore an open world with magnificent graphics, alone or with a friend in split screen.

-Use the power of time to change the environment by traveling to the past or future.

-Face increasingly difficult bosses and discover their weak points.

-Participate in various mini-games or compete against your friends in this game created by one person.

-Summon allies using a QR code to help you in this event-packed adventure.

-The adventure can be experienced with four different characters: Jones, Guynelk, Elsa or Saphir, each with specific skills. For example, Jones can use bombs or a drone to stun enemies and monitor the surroundings. Guynelk masters elemental powers such as fire, ice and electricity. Elsa can fly and attack from a distance, while Saphir excels in sword techniques.

name: UKNON Jones & Guynelk 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: After Jones' friends are rescued, Jones discovers that his grandfather has mysteriously disappeared. He was looking for a mythical treasure called: "Crystal Cereal". Jones, Guynelk, Elsa LOVELUST and Princess Sapphire decide to search for the crystal cereals to find Jones' grandfather.
supported_languages:
English, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Korean
*languages with full audio support
